Abstract: Tattoos, body painting and body piercing make great headway among mainstream Americans at end of 20th century, and experts on body adorment agree that new century will bring only more forms of the art; photo (M)
Snippet: Tattoos, body painting and body piercing make great headway among mainstream Americans at end of 20th century, and experts on body adorment agree that new century will bring only more forms of the art; photo (M)
LeadParagraph: IT took America almost the entire 20th century to catch up with the rest of the world in its collective interest in body adornment, but in the end the country's beauty industry has embraced its extremes.

Headline.Main: A Stud in Every Tongue, and Logo Tattoos
Headline.PrintHeadline: VISIONS: CITIES; A Stud in Every Tongue, and Logo Tattoos
